original_title: White Wolves: Ghosts of the Arctic
overview: We follow a pack of wolves on Ellesmere Island, in Canadaâ€™s far north, as they struggle to raise their pups in the brief arctic summer. Hidden in her den, the alpha female of the pack gives birth to a new generation. Time is of the essence: her pups need to grow quickly and they have much to learn if they are to survive the merciless winter ahead.
title: White Wolves: Ghosts of the Arctic
